short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds convenient features to facilitate browsing Hacker News threads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Identifies comments by the current user and the original poster, highlights comments made within a specified timeframe, and highlights comments that are targets of Root/Parent/Prev/Next links.
